content:
[
  {
    "problem": "Limited access to in-person education due to location or schedule",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "A virtual classroom platform using video conferencing software such as Zoom or Google Meet",
    "content_solution": "A comprehensive guide on how to set up and run a successful virtual classroom to help instructors navigate the transition to remote teaching",
    "competitors": ["Udemy", "Coursera", "Skillshare"],
    "differentiator": "Focus on live interaction with instructors and peers"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Difficulty in finding quality online courses and instructors",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "A curated online course marketplace that offers only high-quality courses and instructors",
    "content_solution": "A blog that provides reviews and recommendations of online courses and instructors, along with educational resources and tips for online learning",
    "competitors": ["Udemy", "Coursera", "Skillshare"],
    "differentiator": "Focus on quality over quantity"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Lack of motivation and accountability in online learning",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "A virtual study group platform that allows students to connect with peers and hold each other accountable for completing coursework",
    "content_solution": "A motivational blog that offers tips, advice, and success stories from online learners to inspire and encourage students",
    "competitors": ["Study With Me", "Focusmate", "Habitshare"],
    "differentiator": "Focus on community and accountability"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Difficulty in finding affordable online courses and resources",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "A subscription-based online course platform that offers unlimited access to a variety of courses for a low monthly fee",
    "content_solution": "A blog that provides free and low-cost educational resources and tips for online learning, including scholarships and grants for online courses",
    "competitors": ["Skillshare", "LinkedIn Learning", "The Great Courses Plus"],
    "differentiator": "Focus on affordability and accessibility"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Language barrier in accessing online education",
    "importance": 2,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "A virtual language translation platform that integrates with existing online course platforms to provide real-time translation of course content and discussion",
    "content_solution": "A language learning blog that offers free language resources and tips for online learners, including language exchange programs and online tutors",
    "competitors": ["Duolingo", "Rosetta Stone", "Babbel"],
    "differentiator": "Focus on integrating with existing platforms for seamless translation"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Lack of accessibility for learners with disabilities",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 5,
    "no_code_solution": "An accessibility consulting service that provides guidance and support for online course platforms to ensure they are accessible for learners with disabilities",
    "content_solution": "A disability advocacy blog that provides information and resources for online learners with disabilities, including assistive technology and accessibility laws",
    "competitors": ["Accessibyte", "Blackboard Ally", "1in5"],
    "differentiator": "Focus on personalized consulting services for each platform's unique needs"
  }
]
